metadata.title: CVE-2021-47257 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:ieee802154: fix null deref in parse dev addr Fix a logic error that couldresult in a null deref if the user sets the mode incorrectly for the givenaddr type.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-azure package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1123.136~14.04.1').
